CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses (Convention proceedings) - claim dismissed
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the Sakha ( GPE of GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE ORG granted the applicant ’s claims against his former employer , a public company “ LOC ( ORG Авиакомпания « PERSON , “ the company ” ) , and ordered payment of wage arrears and court fees .
CARDINAL . It appears that the judgments could not be enforced as the company went bankrupt . In DATE the court bailiffs forwarded the writs of execution to the company ’s receiver .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant sued the receiver . He claimed that the amounts outstanding should be adjusted for inflation .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG discontinued the proceedings on the ground that the applicant had failed to appear at the hearings of DATE and CARDINAL DATE , despite having been duly notified thereof . The applicant did not appeal against that decision .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant for the second time sued the company ’s receiver , asking to increase the amounts to take account of the inflation .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE ORG dismissed his claim because the company had been declared bankrupt in DATE and had ceased to exist . On DATE ORG of the Sakha ( GPE upheld the judgment on appeal .
CARDINAL . The applicant brought a civil action against ORG . He sought to enforce a ORG - issued promissory note for the purchase of a NORP - made car or to recover the monetary value thereof .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE granted the applicant ’s action and awarded him MONEY ( “ RUR ” , EUR CARDINAL ) . The judgment was not appealed against and it became final and enforceable .

CARDINAL . The applicant was issued with a writ of execution which he submitted to the court bailiffs’ service . On DATE a bailiff of the CARDINALnd ORG of LOC of GPE refused to accept the writ because the law on budget for DATE and the implementing Government regulation , introduced in DATE , established that writs against the ORG were to be submitted directly to ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant sued ORG of the ORG seeking enforcement of the judgment of DATE and adjustment of the judgment debt for inflation . His claim was dismissed in the final instance on DATE by ORG of GPE as having no grounds in the domestic law .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant also complained about the allegedly unlawful decision of the GPE bailiff ’s service to ORG of GPE . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s complaint in the final instance . It found that the bailiff had acted lawfully . The applicant received a copy of the judgment on DATE .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE remains unenforced to date .
